description: Horny hunk Paddy O’Brian gets caught watching porn, and masturbating his huge dick at his desk by his tall, athletic assistant Drew Dixxon. Paddy orders him to get some coffee so Drew hurries out of the room, but it’s not long before muscular Paddy corners him in the kitchen, and insists they talk about what just happened. However, Drew doesn’t have anything to say, and would rather use his mouth to suck on Paddy’s cock, and ultimately show him he’s much better than any porn he’s watching.
title: Putting the ASS in Assistant: Part 1
